fields.label: General Settings
fields.tooltip: These fields determine how the plugin is triggered and basic behavior.

fields.label: Activation Code Service
fields.label_tooltip: This field determines the URL for the web service in charge of generating activation codes.

fields.label: Prepopulate Activation Code Parameter
fields.label_tooltip:
If this field is on, the plugin will add a parameter to the activation service URL with the activation code as value. The final URL will serve as base for the QR Code generation.

"e.g. https://mydoamin.com/getActivationCode?ActivationCode=SC4558U"

fields.label: Activation Code Parameter Name
fields.label_tooltip: Parameter Name to add to the service URL.

fields.label: Heartbeat Activation Service
fields.label_tooltip:
This field determines the URL for the web service in charge of confirming the activation.

Commonly the service will return an HTTP 200 and an Authentication Token and useful user information(userID, username).
